CustomField.description: Actual date the case was updated with the ultimate resolution - applicable for 'Product Issues' and 'Installation Issues' cases
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Actual date the case was updated with the ultimate resolution - applicable for 'Product Issues' and 'Installation Issues' cases.
Analysts to manually enter/check this value when closing the case.
This date will be used for KPI reporting purposes.
CustomField.label: Resolution Date
